extension_description.message: Isibambi sephasiwedi sisiza ukukuvikela ekuhlaseleni kobugebengu bokweba imininingwane ebucayi.

extension_detailed_description.message:
Uma ufaka iphasiwedi yakho ye-Gmail noma ye-Google yomsebenzi noma yikuphi kwangaphandle kwe-accounts.google.com, uzothola isexwayo, ukuze ukwazi ukushintsha iphasiwedi yakho uma kudingeka.

Isibambi sephasiwedi futhi sizama ukuthola amakhasi wokungena ngemvume we-Google okungekona ukukwazisa ngaphambi kokuthi uthayiphe iphasiwedi yakho. Ukuze wenze lokhu, isibambi sephasiwedi sihlola i-HTML yekhasi ngalinye olivakashelayo uma libonakala kwangathi lilingisa ikhasi lokungena le-Google.

FAQ
-- Ingabe isibambi sephasiwedi siyalondoloza iphasiwedi yami?
Cha. Isibambi sephasiwesi asilondoloza amaphasiwedi wakho noma okhiye -- esikhundleni, isebenzisa isithonjana esiphephile sephasiwedi yakho, isilinganise nokhiye wakho wakamuva ngaphakathi kwe-Chrome ukusiza ukukhomba isithonjana esiphephile kumasayithi angahle angabi mahle.

-- Ingabe isibambi sephasiwedi siyithumela kuphi idatha?
Uma usebenzisa isibambi sephasiwedi ku-akhawunti ye-Gmail, isibambi sephasiwesi asithumeli idatha kusuka kukhompyutha yami yendawo. Uma umlawuli wakho we-Google yomsebenzi akhipha isibambi sephasiwedi kuzo zonke iziphequluli eziphethwe ze-Chrome kusizinda sakho, umlawuli uzothola izexwayiso uma isibambi sephasiwedi siqupha.

-- Imiphi imikhawu yesibambi sephasiwedi?
Isibambi sephasiwedi asivikeli amawindi we-incognito, izinhlelo zokusebenza ze-Chrome, noma izandiso ze-Chrome. Futhi ayivikeli amaphasiwedi wamasevisi okungewona we-Google. Isibambi sephasiwedi sisebenza kuphela ngaphakathi kwesiphequluli sewebhu se-Chrome uma i-Javascript inikwe amandla.

initialization_message.message: Ukuze isibambi sephasiwedi siqale ukusebenza, sicela ungene ngemvume ku-akhawunti yakho.

password_warning_banner_body.message: Iphasiwedi yakho ye-Gmail isanda kuvezwa ekhasini lokungena okungelona le-Gmail. Kufane usethe kabusha iphasiwedi iphasiwedi yakho ngokushesha ukugcina i-akhawunti yakho ye-Gmail iphephile. Futhi, sicela uqinisekise iphasiwedi yakho ye-Gmail ayisetshenziswa kabusha kwamanye amasevisi -- uma kungenjalo, uma eyodwa yama-akhawutni wakho ifakwa ebucayini, wonke angafakwa ebucayini.

phishing_warning_banner_body.message: Leli sayithi libonakala lisebenzisa inguqulo okungeyona yekhasi lokungena le-Google ukweba iphasiwedi yakho, ngakho-ke livinjiwe. Uma uqonda ukuthi leli sayithi lingalimaza ikhompyutha yakho, ungahle uvakashela leli sayithi kodwa sicela uqaphele mayelana nolwazi olithayiphayo.
